gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.openurl.plugin.rftdb

Class DatabaseResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.openurl.plugin.rftdb.DatabaseResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReferentResolver

    public class DatabaseResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements IReferentResolver
    Alternate IReferentResolver implementation using JDBC & DBCP. Define ImageRecordManager.query to map the unique identifier and file path to 'identifier' and 'imageFile' ----- OpenURLJP2KService.properties ----- OpenURLJP2KService.referentResolverImpl=gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.openurl.plugin.rftdb.DatabaseResolver DatabaseResolver.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost/djatoka DatabaseResolver.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver DatabaseResolver.login=root DatabaseResolver.pwd= DatabaseResolver.query=SELECT identifier, imageFile FROM resources WHERE identifier='\\i'; ----- DEFAULT SCHEMA ----- CREATE TABLE `resources` ( `identifier` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `imageFile` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`identifier`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
    Author:
    Ryan Chute
